thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com
thread.title: Олег Довнар
thread.title_full: Tomtop 的点评人 Олег Довнар

author: Олег Довнар
title: Олег Довнар
text:
TomTop.com - This is a Chinese online store with free shipping worldwide. It works since June 2004. In 2006 he received the title of "Gold Supplier" (Gold Supplier) from the Chinese Alibaba trading platform. The shop assortment there are cell phones, tablets, clothing, shoes and other various gadgets with reasonable price. Also, the store has several warehouses in the UK, Germany and the United States, excluding China. The store, among other things, there is a function dropshipping, through which you can sell products and send them directly from the store, without a single mention of it. And affiliate program, through which you can get 8-10% of the purchases, the buyers attracted by you.
Advantages:
Free shipping all over the world (for a fee you can buy a track), provides a variety of promotions and discounts.
Fast shipping. Most orders were taken for 10-16 days (I think that the standard of delivery, it is quite good).
Disadvantages:
Prices for many products inflated (but not much in the same DX margin more). Slow tech support! 3-7 days can easily wait for a response from them.
